SYSTEM: PlanetData_SIMON_OEGPresentation_oct16.pdf: Página 14
SIMON Project (2/2)
Goals
⚫
To reduce fraud in the use of the European Disable 
Badge for public parking areas.
⚫
To improve navigation solutions for elderly and 
people with disabilities.
Partners: ETRA I+D (Spain), Madrid City Council, 
Institute of Biomechanics of Valencia, Consorcio 
Regional de Transportes de Madrid, Locoslab GmbH 
(Germany), EMEL (Portugal), and Infomobility SpA 
(Italy).
